0 FFFE 1p/2p btn4, coins
1 FFFF starts,1p/2p buttons,services
2 0000   0300 at startup sometimes?
3 00FF 1p/2p joystick
4 FFFF 1p up/down dial
5 1381 1p left/right dial
6 FFFF 2p up/down dial
7 FFFF 2p left/right dial
8 0000
9 FF08 3p/4p buttons
A 0000
B 0FFF 3p/4p joystick
C FFFF 3p up/down dial
D FFFF 3p left/right dial
E 5D15 4p up/down dial
F 0300 4p left/right dial

board test
0=FFFC 1111111111111100

service
1=FDFF 1111110111111111
jamma test
0=f7fe 1111011111111110
tilt
1=FEFF 1111111011111111

1start:
1=EFFF 1110111111111111
1up:
3=00FE 0000000011111110
4=0000
1down
3=00FD 0000000011111101
4=FEFF
1left
3=00FB 0000000011111011
5=1481
1right
3=00F7 0000000011110111
5=1281
1btn1
1=FFFE 1111111111111110
1btn2
1=FFFD 1111111111111101
1btn3
1=FFFB 1111111111111011
1btn4
0=FEFE 1111111011111110

2start:
1=DFFF 1101111111111111
2up
3=00EF 0000000011101111
6=0000
2down
3=00DF 0000000011011111
6=FEFF
2left
3=00BF 0000000010111111
7=0000
2right
3=007F 0000000001111111
7=FEFF
2btn1
1=FFEF 1111111111101111 
2btn2
1=FFDF 1111111111011111
2btn3
1=FFBF 1111111110111111
2btn4
0=FDFE 1111110111111110

3coin
0=FFBE 1111111110111110
3start
1=BFFF 1011111111111111
3left
B=0FFB 0000111111111011
D=0000
3right
B=0FF7 0000111111110111
D=FEFF
3up
B=0FFE 0000111111111110
C=0000
3down
B=0FFD 0000111111111101
C=FEFF
3btn1
9=FE08 1111111000001000
3btn2
9=FD08 1111110100001000
3btn3
9=FB08 1111101100001000
3service
1=FBFF 1111101111111111

4coin
0=FF7E 1111111101111110
4start
1=7FFF 0111111111111111
4left
B=0FBF 0000111110111111
F=0400
4right
B=0F7F 0000111101111111
F=0200
4up
B=0FEF 0000111111101111
E=5E15
4down
B=0FDF 0000111111011111
E=5C15
4btn1
9=EF08 1110111100001000
4btn2
9=DF08 1101111100001000
4btn3
9=BF08 1011111100001000
4service
1=F7FF 1111011111111111
